attributes.action: build skateboard/bmx facilities on mossy bank, boldmere, sutton coldfield or nearby.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is currently nowhere near this area where the public who enjoy such sports as Skateboarding, BMXing or Rollerblading, can go without being told to go elsewhere. The lack of facilities causes many people to go to places where they are not allowed to go but have no choice unless they stop doing what they love to do.
